reviews.text: Overpriced but not more than any other hotel in Stromboli.
reviews.title: Overpriced

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were given a room for 4 which was so small that we ended up staying in 2 double rooms ( so we had to pay almost double the price expected...which was already too high).
reviews.title: Nice but overpriced

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location is perfect, there is a small beach right in front of the hotel and the view is breathtaking
reviews.title: Nice!

reviews.text: We were very pleased from the food at the restaurant but breakfast was average.
reviews.title: B&B with hotel prices

reviews.text: The hotel staff should be able to talk English, although everyone was very friendly and eager to help.
reviews.title: On the beach
